Real dumb question here.  I just installed the bittorrent-gui for ubuntu.  How do I run it?
look in the menu under internet
you might want to check in enable the link in the alacart menu editor
I assume you need a dependency ? there is no difference,  and you'll probably be instlling libgtk2.0
do a search for gtk  and you'll probably see something along the line of  libgtk2.0-dev
cli apps don'T show in the menues you need to run them frmo the terminal
I think you should look in the forum for an answer to taht quesiton  www.ubuntuforums.org
